title: Luxury escapes in Tasmania
text:
If you're looking to impress someone special, Tasmania has opportunities by the bucket load. From cruising around in a private yacht to soaking in an outdoor bathtub while gazing at the Southern Ocean, there are plenty to choose from. 
Besides having the best luxury hotel in Australia (Saffire Freycinet was voted by TripAdvisor's commenters as the top hotel), there's a luxurious wine tour where you fly to the winery for a spot of fly fishing before lunch and plenty of ways to enjoy the wilderness without foregoing creature comforts. 
Here are 20 exclusive escapes in Tasmania that are guaranteed to impress even the most seasoned traveller.
